TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TaskDialog extends System.Object implements class System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window

summary.span: 任务对话框允许显示信息并从用户获取简单输入。

span.span: A task dialog allows to display information and get simple input from the user.

summary.span: 它与 类似（因为格式是由操作系统设置的），但提供了更多功能。

span.span: It is similar to a (in that it is formatted by the operating system) but provides a lot more features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [About Task Dialogs](https://docs.microsoft.com/windows/desktop/Controls/task-dialogs-overview). > [!NOTE] > 若要使用此对话框，需要确保已在 显示对话框之前被调用，或者需要使用包含对6.0.0.0 的依赖项的清单来编译应用程序 (的) 。In order to use the dialog, you need ensure has been called before showing the dialog, or the application needs to be compiled with a manifest that contains a dependency to Microsoft.Windows.Common-Controls (6.0.0.0). > 此外，当前线程应使用单线程单元 (STA) 模型。Additionally, the current thread should use the single-threaded apartment (STA) model.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Close ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed
Public Sub Close ()
public: void Close();
member this.Close : unit -> unit

summary.span: 关闭显示的任务对话框，并将 作为结果按钮。

span.span: Closes the shown task dialog with as resulting button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用不同的结果关闭对话框，请调用 要设置为结果的的方法。To close the dialog with a different result, call the method of the that you want to set as a result. 当对话框正在等待导航完成时，可以调用此方法，而在这 种情况下会引发。This method can be called while the dialog is waiting for navigation to complete, whereas would throw in that case. 调用此方法时， 不会引发事件。When calling this method, the event won't be raised.

summary.span: 获取任务对话框窗口的窗口句柄；如果当前未显示对话框，则为 。

span.span: Gets the window handle of the task dialog window, or if the dialog is currently not being shown.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
Showing the dialog will bind the <ph id="ph1">`page`</ph> and its controls until this method returns or the dialog is navigated to a different page.
